General.Name: Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co
General.Description: Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in trading computer software and hardware products. It also manufactures game software; and offers information software programming services. The company was formerly known as Wayi International Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. in June 2000. Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2.Name: Shu-kai  Shi
2.Title: GM, Chairman, COO & Branch Mang. of Taichung
